movie.title: Dracula Untold
movie.writer: Matt Sazama, Burk Sharpless, Bram Stoker (characters)
movie.actors: Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon, Dominic Cooper, Art Parkinson
movie.plot: At the turn of the century, the young lord Vlad and his family live a peaceful life ruling over their small kingdom, but when a Turk warlord demands from Vlad a thousand boys and his son to create an army Vlad seeks a terrible power that will allow him to protect his kingdom and family from the Turks at a terrible cost.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Neither awful enough to suck nor sharp enough to bite, Dracula Untold misses the point of its iconic character's deathless appeal.
